articles.description: Crude oil prices fall on concerns over war in Ukraine and Saudi production cuts
articles.content: US stocks struggled for direction on Monday, following a global equity sell-off last week, as investors looked ahead to a US inflation report to signal the next move from the Federal Reserve on inter… [+3373 chars]
